dap

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • dap.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to create new Library objects, get their data, remove them from itemsMap, and update their values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor for Library class which initializes a Library object with the required data.
